author: probonopd
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

- Enable developer mode in Windows
- Install Windows Subsystem for Linux 
- Install Xming (or another X Windows Server that runs on Windows) and launch it
- `export DISPLAY=:0`
- Download [PowerShell-6.0.0-alpha.18-x86_64.AppImage](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/download/v6.0.0-alpha.18/PowerShell-6.0.0-alpha.18-x86_64.AppImage)
- `chmod a+x /mnt/c/Users/User/Downloads/PowerShell-6.0.0-alpha.18-x86_64.AppImage`
- `/mnt/c/Users/User/Downloads/PowerShell-6.0.0-alpha.18-x86_64.AppImage --appimage-extract`  since Windows doesn't support FUSE yet
- `./squashfs-root/AppRun`
 
Expected behavior
-----------------

Runs

Actual behavior
---------------

```
./squashfs-root/AppRun: 3: export: (x86)/Intel/iCLS: bad variable name
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
PSEdition                      Core
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.18
CLRVersion
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```
title: AppImage does not run on Windows
